featured.text: It would be difficult to put a value on the things rescued by the Disk Doctor.
Surprised by the father and son’s “pale faces” and their battered vessel, the Penghu police and fishers in Paisha rescued them.
The three whales Tag, Notch, and Baby were rescued because (A) younger whales have a greater chance of survival than the others.

other.text: What does the word rescued in the second paragraph mean? (A) recovered (B) prescribed (C) examined (D) discovered 45.
What did the Vladimirs decide to do after they were rescued?
he wandered alone for a week in a rainforest before being rescued and taken to a center for displaced In 2015 when she was just a 17-year-old, her children in the capital, Kinshasa.

definition.en_def: To save someone from a dangerous or distressing situation.
definition.example: The firefighters worked tirelessly to rescue the trapped animals.
